fields.label: Lightbox
fields.name: lightbox
fields.instructions: Should this image have a lightbox option?

fields.label: First Block
fields.name: first_block
fields.instructions: Is this the first section of the page? This info is used to help accessibility.

sub_fields.label: Button
sub_fields.name: button
sub_fields.instructions: Set the Link Text when choosing your link to set the text that appears on the button.

sub_fields.label: Alt Button
sub_fields.name: alt_button
sub_fields.instructions: Set the Link Text when choosing your link to set the text that appears on the button.

sub_fields.label: Vimeo ID
sub_fields.name: vimeo_id
sub_fields.instructions: Put the ID of the Vimeo video you want to display. Example: https://player.vimeo.com/video/473898338

sub_fields.label: YouTube ID
sub_fields.name: youtube_id
sub_fields.instructions: Put the ID of the YouTube video you want to display. Example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=/bMkvHLDsX_Y
